text: Knema pierrei is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Vietnam and was thought to be VUlnerable.World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Knema pierrei. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. (retrieved 22 August 2007) However, according to The Plant List and GBIF, K. peirrei is a synonym of Knema furfuracea (Hook. f. & Thomson) Warb.The Plant List (retrieved 19 January 2018) ==References== pierrei Category:Endemic flora of Vietnam Category:Trees of Vietnam Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Knema pierrei
